detectors.description:
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#40-56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value >= balanceOf[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#46)
	- previousBalances = balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#48)
	- balanceOf[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#50)
	- balanceOf[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#52)
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenERC20.sol#55)
